title: CANCEL (Snowflake Scripting) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Cancels an asynchronous child job that is running for a
RESULTSET.

This Snowflake Scripting construct is valid only within a
Snowflake Scripting block.
An asynchronous child job is created for a RESULTSET when the ASYNC keyword is specified for the query.
If the child job for the RESULTSET has already completed, the CANCEL statement has no effect.
